title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Brandel Chamblee about what he expects to see from  Tiger Woods in Round 2 at the Masters. Sports Center anchors Michael Eaves talks about interviewing Tiger after yesterday's round. Tiger's good friend Notah Begay calls in to discuss when Tiger started to think it was realistic that he could play the Masters this year. And Hall of Fame pitcher John Smoltz explains why he likes PitchCom

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Brandel Chamblee about what he expects to see from  Tiger Woods in Round 2 at the Masters. Sports Center anchors Michael Eaves talks about interviewing Tiger after yesterday's round. Tiger's good friend Notah Begay calls in to discuss when Tiger started to think it was realistic that he could play the Masters this year. And Hall of Fame pitcher John Smoltz explains why he likes PitchCom
